<!-- source-hash: adc8d68fd3d60fe0df2a37a621368c54 -->
Configuration class for OpenAPI/Swagger documentation generation for the OpenFrame External API, providing comprehensive API documentation with authentication and rate limiting details.

## Key Components

- **`openAPI()`** - Creates the main OpenAPI specification with API metadata, authentication scheme, and detailed documentation
- **`externalApiGroup()`** - Defines grouped API documentation for external endpoints, including path matching rules
- **Security Configuration** - Sets up API key authentication using `X-API-Key` header
- **Server Configuration** - Configures the API server endpoint at `/external-api`

## Usage Example

```java
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1")
public class ExampleController {
    
    @Operation(summary = "Get user data", security = @SecurityRequirement(name = "ApiKeyAuth"))
    @GetMapping("/users/{id}")
    public ResponseEntity<User> getUser(@PathVariable String id) {
        // This endpoint will be documented with API key authentication
        return ResponseEntity.ok(userService.findById(id));
    }
}
```

The configuration automatically generates Swagger UI documentation accessible at `/swagger-ui.html`, including:
- API key authentication requirements (`X-API-Key: ak_keyId.sk_secretKey`)
- Rate limiting information (100/min, 1000/hour, 10000/day defaults)
- Error response codes and descriptions
- Interactive API testing interface
